learning_objectives.description: Calculate unknown angles and give explanations using the following geometrical properties of circles: angle in a semicircle = 90°, angle between tangent and radius = 90°, angle at the centre is twice the angle at the circumference, angles in the same segment are equal, opposite angles of a cyclic quadrilateral sum to 180° (supplementary), alternate segment theorem.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Candidates are expected to use the geometrical properties listed in the syllabus when giving reasons for answers.
